entry.title: Vite report on Tue, 26 Dec 2023 08:03:13
entry.summary: In recent news, there have been significant developments in various fields. Firstly, there is a helpful guide on how to deploy React or Vite projects on GitHub Pages using gh-pages. This information will undoubtedly assist developers in showcasing their work and reaching a wider audience. On a different note, it appears that Rudy Giuliani's longstanding tenure as a knight may be coming to an end. After serving as a knight for over 20 years, his future in this role seems uncertain. Lastly, in a positive move, the state of Hawaii has selected nearly 500 healthcare workers burdened with student debt to have a portion of their loans paid off. This initiative aims to alleviate the financial strain on these individuals by offering up to $100,000 in loan forgiveness. These developments highlight the diverse happenings in the world, ranging from technological advancements to political shifts and initiatives to support essential workers.
